title: The Library: Where Life Checks Out
description: When Mark Waters decided to be a detective, he didn't plan to investigate ghosts.  But as he sifts through evidence of a supposed suicide by train, he learns a murder that took place eighty years ago may directly affect his case.  Six months after the strange occurrences at The Depot, there’s another murder. This time, The Library holds secrets of several murders, and the dead won’t rest until the murderer checks out too.
author: Carmen DeSousa
